item.title: Bailey's Story
item.description: My love for stem came from meeting one of my best friends, Tom Day, back in 2016. He got me into computer programming. This opened a whole lot of doors in opportunities for me, such as attending my first academic camp hosted by the National Computer Science School in 2019. Through this, I found a love for all things STEM! This camp was honestly one of the best experiences of my life.
